args: const http = require('http'); const url = require('url'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { const parsedUrl = url.parse(req.url, true); if (parsedUrl.pathname === '/mcp' && req.method === 'POST') { let body = ''; req.on('data', chunk => body += chunk); req.on('end', () => { const options = { hostname: 'mcp.context7.com', port: 443, path: '/mcp', method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': Buffer.byteLength(body) } }; const proxyReq = require('https').request(options, proxyRes => { res.writeHead(proxyRes.statusCode, proxyRes.headers); proxyRes.pipe(res); }); proxyReq.write(body); proxyReq.end(); }); } else { res.writeHead(404); res.end(); } }); server.listen(0, () => console.log(JSON.stringify({port: server.address().port})));
